participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys expressing himself through music production.
participant_1.background: i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza. i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my pets name is charlie.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, loves spending time outdoors and enjoys a range of food.
participant_2.background: i like to take walks. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i don't drink soda.

content.text: I am good. how about you? what do you do for a living?
ah, boring nine to five office job. Pays for the house I live in
I live in a honda civic. do you like music? I love rap
that must be quite small in there. I like folk music
I love folk music. do you have any hobbies? I like to produce
I like rap music. do you? I am a music fan. I love it
rap music is not my kind of thing. burgers and fries are my thing
I really like pizza. what is your favourite food? mine is charlie
charlie, that's slang for chinese? I'm not a fan of ethnic food
I love chinese food. do you drive a honda? I do. it is my favourite
you seem to fond of all things asian.
it is. I do not know how to do that
